5YEARS/150 000KM WARRANTY AND A 5YEARS/90 000KM SERVICE PLAN

The Mahindra XUV300’s exemplary safety credentials remain unmatched in its class. The refreshed XUV300 has design language that includes full volumes, sculpted sections, and muscled surfaces. It also has the distinctive Mahindra bold grille with chrome highlights on the highest specification level which includes the multi-spoke, diamond cut 16’ alloy wheels, packed with the latest technology& safety features, such as the multifunction steering wheel.

Book your test drive today
